list_definition.definition: to guard or protect against attack

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: I am prepared to defend my opinions.

list_definition.definition: to conduct the defence/defense of (a person) in a law court.

Even if they can, the abilities of defending their sovereignties are not equal!
Although the thesis is very plausible, it is not at all easy to see how it might be defended.
